casebody.data:
ART METAL WORKS, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. NATIONAL SILVER CO., Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 251. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 4, 1938. Ward, Crosby & Neal, of New York City (Kenneth S. Neal, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. John P. Chandler, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the authority of Nat Lewis Purses v. Carole Bags, 2 Cir., 83 F.2d 475, and Berlinger v. Busch Jewelry Co., 2 Cir., 48 F.2d 812.
